name: Hot Coco Thank You Favor or Place setting
description:
“May you have warm words on a cold evening, a full moon on a dark night and a smooth road all the way to your door.”...this is a Cuddly Chic Boutique original. 

A plastic clear ornament for the tree, BUT filled with Hot Chocolate and extra Marshmallows enough for two cups. Attached you will find a "Thank You" tag. A wonderful idea for a favor at your baby shower that has a winter theme. 

This can also be used as place settings for your holiday dinner party, the tag would say the persons name instead of thank you. 

OR you can use this unique ornament to top off your gift.

***If you would like this to be a place setting you will have to send me a list of the names***

***MIN ORDER OF 5*** 
***SHOULD YOU NEED ANOTHER AMOUNT CONTACT ME****
phone:888-492-4415 or email: sales@cuddlychicboutique.com

name: Giddy Cowgirl Large Diaper Cake
description:
Boots, chaps and cowgirl hats... nothin' else matters. Little girls like to play dress up why not be a Cowgirl?!

This adorable Diaper cake is made up of 69 Diapers in total: 32 Size 2 & 37 Size 1

Recipe:
*Pink stripe ruffle onesie size 6-9 months
*Jean overall skirt size 6-9 months
*Cowgirl pink Hat
*Ride it pony stick with detachable pink bow
*Cow coin bank
*Pink cowgirl boots size 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The idea behind all of my boutique style diaper cakes is that the cake is not only useful for a newborn, but will have a little something as the child grows.

name: Christmas ribbon topiary centerpiece
description:
This is a adorable centerpiece for a Christmas Themed Party for a holiday get together at home, a Christmas bridal shower or baby shower theme are to just name a few ...too cute! Balls are full of ribbon, love and no bald spots anywhere! Each ribbon loop is also secured with glue to prevent from coming apart. Includes Diaper cake base. 

This listing is for 1 (one) ribbon topiary and decorated winter wood sled base, measures approximately 10" wide at the ball and height 19". Using a 5" styrofoam ball Every topiary is made to order and unique. (This would be considered a Small size)

Colors:
* Christmas Red
* White
* Silver
* Accented with some green

Because each item is custom some ribbon selections may differ from what is shown. The colors schemes will be the same but the prints or backgrounds may differ. This is dependent upon seasonal stock in stores. Please contact me if you have any specific needs.

If you are interested in different colors. I will be happy to work with you on making your topiary special. Custom created in your colors. Available in Sets. Here at Cuddly Chic Boutique our Topiaries are larger then others you will find and the most unique. 

Any of these Can be made to please a child or an adults taste. Dress them up or play them down. If you have any ideas and ant find what you are looking for, contact me and I'll do my best to bring your vision a reality! 


I can also be reached by phone   888-492-4415      
Thanks for stopping by!

name: Fairy Tutu and wing set
description:
This adorable and affordable costume is perfect for your little girl in your life. What a hit this will be at your next halloween party! Waist size 18" perfect fit for ages 4-6

Another great idea: If your daughter like mine loves to dress up, I made this for her birthday party and all the little guest got one as they walked through the door. A wonderful addition to a Fairy themed birtday party. 

contact me if you need muntiple orders for a birthday party.

Other Colors avilable:
*Pink
*Orange
*Red
*Blue
*Green
*Purple

name: Santa Baby infant tutu dress
description:
How adorable for the little girl in your life. Perfect for first Christmas outfit or just perfect for the holiday cards. 

This tutu dress will fit 3-9 months comes with Mary Jane socks and sequin headband.
